name: Rumtek Monastery - Main Prayer Hall
description: Experience the grandeur of Rumtek Monastery's main prayer hall, one of the largest and most important monasteries in Sikkim.

hotspots.title: Golden Buddha Statue
hotspots.description: The magnificent golden Buddha statue, the centerpiece of the prayer hall.

hotspots.title: Prayer Wheels
hotspots.description: Traditional prayer wheels that monks spin during meditation.

hotspots.title: Monk's Seating Area
hotspots.description: Where the monks gather for daily prayers and ceremonies.

name: Pemayangtse Monastery - Courtyard View
description: Take in the peaceful courtyard of Pemayangtse Monastery with stunning views of the Kanchenjunga mountain range.

hotspots.title: Kanchenjunga View
hotspots.description: Breathtaking view of the third highest mountain in the world.

hotspots.title: Prayer Flags
hotspots.description: Colorful prayer flags fluttering in the mountain breeze.

hotspots.title: Monastery Architecture
hotspots.description: Traditional Sikkimese monastery architecture with intricate woodwork.

name: Gangtok Cityscape - MG Marg View
description: Experience the vibrant heart of Gangtok from MG Marg, the main shopping and cultural street of Sikkim's capital.

hotspots.title: MG Marg Street
hotspots.description: The pedestrian-only main street of Gangtok, bustling with shops and restaurants.

hotspots.title: Traditional Shops
hotspots.description: Local shops selling traditional Sikkimese handicrafts and souvenirs.

hotspots.title: Mountain Views
hotspots.description: Panoramic views of the surrounding Himalayan mountains.
